main event: An observer noted a round-shaped object climbing slowly in the eastern sky from a low altitude in Corpus Christi, Texas.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 80 minutes and did not disappear., The observer used an 8 Power telescope to view the object., The object had a small red tail on the bottom side., The sighting coincided with the rising of Jupiter and Sirius., The weather conditions were clear with no cloud cover during the sighting.
witness description: civilian observer, reliability rated as good
